title: Manowar - 1987 - Fighting The World [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
Fighting the World is fifth album released by Manowar on 1987. This was the first Manowar album to feature artwork by long-time collaborator Ken Kelly, and also the first heavy metal album to be recorded and mixed entirely on digital equipment. Since Fighting The World, all Manowar album covers have been painted by Ken Kelly.


"Defender" features the speech of Orson Welles. The album was released 2 years after Welles died. The recording of Welles' speech was re-used from the original 1982 demo of the song.

MP3 - 320kbs
